Definition: Given an English language product review, determine if it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the product's review has positive tone. A Bad review is one where the tone of product's review is negative.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: As I was taking my last round of antibiotics, every time another would come on the next day, I would have to take them again. The side effects were horrible in about two weeks, until we came across our dog with some severe infections. Her eyes looked awful, she had massive sores all over and the little pounces that kept getting stuck in her throat just became too painful.

I gave this a 1 star because the title really fits my review. The "gift" is about like what you would get in one of those paper bags that they shove inside every Christmas present, but it didn't cost much! A total waste. It's cheaply made and looks it. It takes 2 AAA batteries each. Don't even bother.

These lenses suck they should let people know when buying the lens that it is made out of plastic not glass, so in my opinion, dont waste ur money. if anyone has contacts do NOT use them with these lens.

We used this for years until it broke. I don't know about the other reviewers, but my original didn't last much less than 6 years. So when that one broke we decided to buy a new one. It worked ok except they have made things so cheap these days with plastic parts (the cover and power cable got torn up in two months).Then after 4 months of very light use it died. And now I'm stuck trying to figure out how to dispose of it.

This stuff is very effective. I can't really tell much of a difference on my skin. It does have good ingredients that are better than most face lotions, which is why you'll want to use it. But you don't need to. If you're going for something natural and organic, then go with this one. It's been great at keeping out the rain when we've had storms here! =) And no nasty chemicals. Yay! :o)
This is just as poorly constructed and even worse designed than the "cheap" one we had. I expect better from Cuisinart.

The case does look good. My wife was impressed with it. But the screen protector scratches easily. Also, very difficult to take off. Very disappointed that something so inexpensive came broken when shipped! Guess you get what pay for! Don't waste your time unless it's just a decoration or something you only occasionally use.

The product itself was fine. I ordered two of them to replace a battery that died while charging in the phone overnight. But they charge well just not long enough for my situation. Next time I will try one like Sony OEM. Not as expensive and work much better. Very disappointed as it is almost needed at this point where we live with out electricity. And there are no other batteries from Amazon or local stores but another vendor on Amazon.
